message.content: Figma is a cloud-based design tool that allows users to create, collaborate on and share interactive prototypes of websites and mobile apps. It's primarily used by web and app developers, designers, product managers, and other stakeholders involved in the development process. Figma provides real-time collaboration features, allowing teams to work together on designs simultaneously from anywhere with an internet connection. Additionally, it offers a range of pre-designed components such as buttons, icons, and forms that can be easily incorporated into projects.
